# CoreX storage - ipfs

This package provides an implementation of the CoreX storage interface for ipfs.

## Installation
~~~bash
pip install corex-storage-ipfs
~~~

## Usage
~~~python
from corex_storage_ipfs.handler import IpfsHandler
handler = IpfsHandler()
handler.example_method()
~~~
